name: Vegan Queso Nachos
author: Main House
summary: Easy, peasy, lemon squeezy vegan nacho recipe. Dress your nachos up in a way that you love to. I love to use cilantro, tomatoes, avocado, refried beans, and dairy free sour cream as yummy toppings.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons oil, or more as needed
directions: Combine tofu, carrots,  , nutritional yeast, onion powder, and garlic powder in a blender or food processor
Transfer queso to a small saucepan over medium heat
Cook until hot enough to serve, 5 to 10 minutes
At the same time, heat oil in a skillet over medium heat
Add vegetarian crumbles and cook and stir until browned, 8 to 10 minutes
Serve tortilla chips on individual plates topped with cooked crumbles and hot queso
